channel.title: Copper on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Copper on COTTON

item.title: GhAOC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAOC1 Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Improvement of copper tolerance of Arabidopsis by transgenic expression of an allene oxide cyclase gene, GhAOC1, in upland cotton.

item.title: GhPIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPIP2|6 Gene Name: plasma membrane intrinsic protein 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhPIP2|6|3 interacted with GhPIP2|6|4 and GhPIP2|6|GhPIP2|6, but GhPIP2|6|GhPIP2|6 did not interact with GhPIP2|6|4.
